item.description:
PAYMENT POLICY:
$30 if pre-paid
REGISTER AND PAY HERE:
http://moxievision.ev...

Dating but not sure what you want? Sort of sure, but want more clarity? In a relationship and not sure if it meets your expectations? Discover your vision for relationships, romantic or friendship, with this workshop, led by Certified Life Coach Julie Melillo. You’ll create a “Relationship Vision” complete with all the things that you need to be happy.Bring a notebook or journal and a pen and come ready to brainstorm! Exercises, questions and tools will help you create your vision.

*Discover what you really want in relationships!
*Create a “Relationship Vision”
*Naturally attract the right people
*Know what you will and won’t accept
*Take action more easily by understanding and trusting yourself
*Learn how to visualize
*Choose your ultimate goal for relationships -- and find out how to achieve it more easily using visualization

About your Workshop Leader:
Coach, writer, artist, speaker Julie Melillo is a Certified Life Coach who coaches entrepreneurs, CEOs, financial traders, attorneys and artists in Manhattan. She is a member of the NYC International Coach Federation chapter and recently appeared on Life Coach TV. Julie brings her passion for personal development to her clients withher five-step goal-reaching success process andpersonality type strength expertise.
Once payment is received, two days before the teleclass, you will receive the calling conference/bridge number and PIN to access this teleclass.
item.name: Discover Your Vision For Your Relationships - Teleclass - 8pm Eastern Time
